author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Havana, Buenos Aires are Spaniards’ most preferred vacation cityTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Havana, Buenos Aires are Spaniards’ most preferred vacation city
Havana and Buenos Aires were the two most wanted Latin American cities by Spanish people for vacation the first month of this summer, the specialized search engine Jetcost reported yesterday (Aug 14).
Havana ranked fourth among foreign destinations, preceded by London, Paris, and Rome, while Buenos Aires ranked sixth, behind Amsterdam, and Brussels ahead.
Madrid was the most wanted city in July, followed by Barcelona and Palma de Mallorca, in the list of 20, among which seven Spanish destinations are included.
Since its creation in 2006, Jetcost has become one of the major search engines in Europe. At present, it is available in 38 countries and is expanding in America and Asia.
